name: Pelicans Albany

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed three nights at Pelicans in a standard unit which was spotless and comfortable, especially the armchairs! Everything you needed in the kitchen and a parking space right outside. Laundry and BBQ available for all guests to share, again spotless. Hosts were very helpful. Only a short walk from Ellen Cove which is one end of Middleton Beach and an even shorter walk to Bay Merchants, a lovely deli/specialty food outlet which is open for breakfast, lunch and tea. We could only find one restaurant (on the beach) which was pricey and the Squid Shack at Emu Point had been recommended but we were disappointed with the food. Lots of restaurants in Albany itself which is about 3km away. Beautiful area - Whale World is well worth a visit as is The Gap and the Natural Bridge which are both close by. Another lovely beach was Little Beach in Two Peoples Bay east of Middleton.
reviews.title: Everything you need a block from the beach

reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights while in Albany. Clean apartment, sunny clean kitchen.
reviews.title: Good option for family

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Friendly owners who were seen planting flowers in the compound. The place shows that care has been given. Car can be parked right next to the unit.
reviews.title: Great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Apartment with large living space and 2 bedrooms had good space for 4 of us.
reviews.title: great location and excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 5 minute walk to beach with good restaurant Calamari by the Sea. Good food. pleasant area to stay in.
reviews.title: Great beach location

likes.liked: — Well appointed luxury in great location
likes.disliked: — Not being told that rooms were not serviced daily

description: Located in Middleton Beach Albany, in the Great Southern Region of Western Australia, where pristine beaches are lapped by warm, clear ocean, Pelicans Albany creates an inviting ambiance for an unforgettable stay.Set on magnificent grounds and tranquil surroundings that feature a spacious garden and barbecue area, each beautifully appointed air-conditioned unit has a host of features. A private courtyard or balcony, dining and lounge area, private bathroom and in some cases two. The modern kitchen includes large fridge, oven and microwave. In addition, each unit boasts a flat screen TV, DVD player and free Wi-Fi internet and Cable TV. Laundry facilities and free on-site car parking are also provided.All these luxuries ensure you have the independence and flexibility of your own self-catered home, together with the comfort and service of a hotel.While being just minutes away from the stunning Middleton Beach shoreline, Pelicans Albany is within close proximity to all the major tourist attractions, popular local activities, shops and restaurants that Albany is renowned for.Our exclusive units are also available for short and long term rental on a self-catered basis, making them an ideal accommodation solution for Corporate Consultants, Government Contractors, Diplomats, Renovators and Re-locators.
